00016 class InstanceHandler
00017 {
00018   private:
00019     const char *m_description;
00020     const char *m_pluginName;
00021   public:
00022     GlobalFunc *global;
00023     InstanceHandler(GlobalFunc *g, void *context, LWError *err)
00024     {
00025         global = g;
00026         return;
00027     }
00029     virtual LWError Load(const LWLoadState *ls) {return NULL;}

00042 template <class T>
00043 class InstanceAdaptor
00044 {
00045   protected:
00047     static void Activate(LWInstanceFuncs *inst, GlobalFunc *global) {
00048       inst->create  = InstanceAdaptor::Create;
00049       inst->destroy = InstanceAdaptor::Destroy;
00050       inst->copy    = InstanceAdaptor::Copy;
00051       inst->load    = InstanceAdaptor::Load;
00052       inst->save    = InstanceAdaptor::Save;
00053       inst->descln  = InstanceAdaptor::DescLn;
00054       inst->priv    = global; // pass on the global
00055     }
00056   private:
00057     static LWInstance Create (void *priv, void *context, LWError *err)
00058     {
00059       T *plugin = new T((GlobalFunc *)priv, context, err);
00060       dostream d;
00061       d << "Created new plugin at and passing it to LW: " << plugin << "\n";
00062       d << "GlobalFunc: " << priv << "\n";
00063 
00064       return (LWInstance) plugin;
00065       //return new T((GlobalFunc *)priv, context, err);
00066     }
00067 
00068     static void Destroy (LWInstance instance)
00069     {
00070       T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00071       delete plugin;
00072     }
00073 
00074     static LWError Copy (LWInstance instance, LWInstance instance2)
00075     {
00076       T *to = (T *) instance;
00077       T *from = (T *) instance2;
00078       to = from;
00079       return NULL;
00080     }
00081 
00082     static LWError Load (LWInstance instance, const LWLoadState *ls)
00083     {
00084       T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00085       return plugin->Load(ls);
00086     }
00087 
00088     static LWError Save (LWInstance instance, const LWSaveState *ss)
00089     {
00090       T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00091       return plugin->Save(ss);
00092     }
00093 
00094     static const char *DescLn (LWInstance instance)
00095     {
00096         T *plugin = (T *) instance;
00097         return plugin->DescLn();
00098     }

00154   protected:

00157         dostream d;
